contents: Article 25 (Acting for the Chairman) ① When the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to an accident, the Chairman among the Vice-Chairmen shall perform his duties on his behalf in the order established at the time of appointment of the Vice-Chairman. ② Agents pursuant to Paragraph 1 and Article 24-2, Paragraph 2 perform normal affairs and cannot handle affairs outside the scope of the status quo, such as policy changes or personnel transfers. Revised October 13, 2020, ③ In the event of a vacancy in the position of Chairman, the following shall apply. Revised March 16, 2021, 1. If the remaining term of office is less than one year, the person pursuant to paragraph 1 shall perform the duties, and in this case, shall be deemed to be the chairman under the relevant laws. However, if there is a resolution at the general meeting, a new chairman may be elected in accordance with Article 24. Newly established March 16, 2021, 2. If the remaining term of office is more than one year, a new president must be elected within 60 days. Newly established 2021. 3. 16.
